text: Ricki Lynn Seidman (born August 24, 1955) is an activist and political adviser and a government official. == Background == Seidman was born on August 24, 1955, to a Jewish family to Frank Seidman and Eileen Joan. == Career == Seidman graduated with B.A. from Miami University and got a J.D. from the University of Georgia School of Law. Upon completion she worked as a senior investigator for the investigation firm. == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American activists
title: Ricki Seidman
